018package org.tquadrat.foundation.lang;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021
022import java.util.Optional;
023import java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock;
024
025import org.apiguardian.api.API;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.AutoLock.ExecutionFailedException;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.internal.LockExecutorImpl;
029
030/**
031 *  Allows to execute an operation with an obtained lock.
032 *
033 *  @version $Id: LockExecutor.java 944 2021-12-21 21:56:24Z tquadrat $
034 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
035 *  @UMLGraph.link
036 *  @since 0.1.0
037 */
038@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: LockExecutor.java 944 2021-12-21 21:56:24Z tquadrat $" )
039@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
040public sealed interface LockExecutor
041    permits LockExecutorImpl
042{
043        /*---------*\
044    ====** Methods **==========================================================
045        \*---------*/
046    /**
047     *  Executes the given action.
048     *
049     *  @param  action  The action.
050     *  @throws ExecutionFailedException    The action failed for some
051     *      reason.
052     */
053    public void execute( final Action action ) throws ExecutionFailedException;
054
055    /**
056     *  Executes the given operation.
057     *
058     *  @param  <R> The type of the operation's result.
059     *  @param  operation   The operation.
060     *  @return An instance of
061     *      {@link Optional}
062     *      that holds the result of the operation.
063     *  @throws ExecutionFailedException    The operation failed for some
064     *      reason.
065     */
066    public <R> Optional<R> execute( final Operation<R> operation ) throws ExecutionFailedException;
067
068    /**
069     *  Creates a new {@code LockExecutor} from the given
070     *  {@link Lock}
071     *  instance.
072     *
073     *  @param  lock    The lock.
074     *  @return The new {@code LockExecutor}.
075     */
076    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
077    public static LockExecutor of( final Lock lock )
078    {
079        final var retValue = LockExecutorImpl.of( lock );
080
081        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
082        return retValue;
083    }   //  of()
084
085    /**
086     *  Creates a new {@code LockExecutor} from the given
087     *  {@link AutoLock}
088     *  instance.
089     *
090     *  @param  lock    The lock.
091     *  @return The new {@code LockExecutor}.
092     */
093    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
094    public static LockExecutor of( final AutoLock lock )
095    {
096        final var retValue = LockExecutorImpl.of( lock );
097
098        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
099        return retValue;
100    }   //  of()
101}
102//  interface LockExecutor
103
104/*
105 *  End of File
106 */
